body.name: 32 QT Digital Toaster Oven Air Fryer Combo, AUMATE by Kitchen in the box Convection Oven Countertop, 19-in-1 Smart Airfryer, Pizza Oven, Toast Bake and Broil, Rotisserie, 7 Accessories, 1800W

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Kitchen in the box Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs
features: 【Less Oil and Healthy Diet】AUMATE Kitchen in the box counter-top convection toaster ovens adopts surround 360° air convection technology, convection fan help increases air flow circulation more faster, locks in moisture, avoid food scorching due to uneven heating. Which up to 75% less fat and grease compared with traditional frying method, but you can get same crisp and delicious taste food.

【18 Preset Functions and Advanced Dual Function】AUMATE Kitchen in the box air fryer toaster oven combo can fulfill air fry, bake, roast, broil, toast, dehydrate, rotisserie, defrost, warm, proof, and so on, one machines can meet all your cooking needs, great space saver. Meanwhile the innovative dual cook function enables you to combine any two functions in preset. Make Complex recipes effortless and rich the dish's flavor.

【32QT Extra-Large Capacity and 6 Accessories】This conection toaster oven has a large interior capacity, which fits 13-inch pizaa, 9 slice toast, 6lbs rotisserie chicken and whole turkey, 6 accessories can meet all your cooking needs. It's perfect for whole family party.

【Powerful, Fast and Save Time】AUMATE Kitchen in the box toaster ovens countertop with 6 heat elements, 1800 watt in total, meanwhile double glass door heat reduces heat loss effectively, this will reduce cooking time greatly.

【Precise Temperature Control & Crispy Taste】This convection oven built in smart chips and temp sensors, which work together to control temperature and eliminate cold spots, the temperature error is within 5°F.
body.description: AUMATE Kitchen in the box 1800W Air Fryer Toaster Oven Aumate is a Texas-based brand with a manufacturing base in Hong Kong. By combining American originality with superior Chinese production methods, we are able to keep our quality high and our prices low. 18 functions: Air fry, chips, wings, pizza, steak, cookies, snacks, veggies, bake, bagel, roast, broil, toast, dehydrate, defrost, warm, proof, reheat. Healthier with less oil: Cooking food with less oil, but with a crisper texture and more intense flavour. Convection Fan: Adopting the new technology of 360° constant hot air circulation, it greatly avoids food scorching caused by uneven heating. Faster Cooking: The 1800 Watts air fryer saves you time by cooking food faster. Precise temperature control: The temperature can be adjusted every 5°F to avoid burning food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t used the rotisserie or dehydrator but I have used all the other settings and so far so good. I have only used it for about 1/2 hr or so but did not find it to get that hot outside like some said. It is quite large so does take a lot of space up on the counter. Only thing I don’t like is the pan does not clean well so use foil to keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic and easy to use and cooks..bakes and air frys wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have never eaten so many pizzas! This air fryer does it all and is a great size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Easy to clean. Just baked. Will update when I use other features. So far very happy with purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars ACTS like an oven, cooks well.
reviews.reviewText: First, it does not broil or toast or anything else of that specifically defined variety EXCEPT INSOFAR as those features are emulated by the system software and fans. For example, the manufacturer confirmed when broiling BOTH burners are used "to heat the food evenly." I haven't tried the dual heat and probably wont bother at this point.SO it is an air fryer that ACTS more like an oven in daily use. It does cook well and hasn't failed to deliver so I will be keeping it foremost in my kitchen. If the coating on the basket holds up (wash VERY gently) for another couple years I will come back and up my review another star or so.(Also the manufacturer confirmed the top burners do not get visibly "red hot" because of the fan blowing down on them. Other info on youtube seems to confirm this is often true in air fryers and types of burners in general.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven't use it a bunch yet but so far I'm very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 in 1 Situation… Great choice 👍🏼
reviews.reviewText: My girl threw away our microwave and toaster. She loves it and very pleased with this choice.She says it’s a super high quality and the accessories are excellent (pan, basket, and rack).It keeps temperature well. It's well-insulated and doesn't require a heat mat underneath it. It's attractive. Super easy to clean with the pull-out. And she likes how it saves her space on our kitchen counter.Her only downside is the way you’ve to cycle through the mode. She wished if it was touch or physical buttons for more convenience.4 stars from her due to the buttons situation, 5 stars from me because i loved all the food came out of it 👌🏼We both recommend it 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: It takes a moment to figure operating procedures, but it cooks great. I love the extra racks and tumbler basket..
